definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: My boy friend rephrased it as, it’s the early worm that gets caught.
sentences.chinese: 它到我男友那就成了“早起的蟲兒會被喫”。

sentences.english: Since it's the early worm that gets eaten by the bird, sleep late.
sentences.chinese: 既然早起的蟲兒被鳥喫，睡晚點起來好了。

sentences.english: The waxy surface in the red tube stops bugsfrom climbing free.
sentences.chinese: 紅管裏白色蠟質物質，防止蟲兒逃脫。

sentences.english: Under the moonlight, oil in catcher in whisper.
sentences.chinese: 月光下，油蟲兒在麥田裏低吟。

definition: A rabbit doesn't eat the grass by its own burrow (idiom); One shouldn't do anything to harm one's neighbors.
pinyin: tu4 zi5 bu4 chi1 wo1 bian1 cao3

definition: make your day's plan early in the morning (idiom)/early morning is the golden time of the day
pinyin: yi1 ri4 zhi1 ji4 zai4 yu2 chen2

definition: please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
lit. rarely seen, very strange (idiom); to express amazement due to lack of experience/naive expression of excitement due to ignorance
crow's beak/(fig.) person who makes an inauspicious remark
weary old body (colloquial term, used jocularly or irreverently)
